title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge construction at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton). Until Sat Nov 30. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes. Project completion: 30 November 2024. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 3:02 PM PST. (DBC-56391)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton)
Description: Bridge construction. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Sun Dec 15 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 10:06 AM PST. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Bridge closed. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily + Saturdays. Alternate route via Hwy 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm) Single lane alternating traffic from 8PM-6AM PST, expect 20 minute delays. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 3:03 PM PST. (DBC-70490)

title: Highway 101 Both Directions
description: Highway 101, in both directions. Special event planned between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River). Starting Sun Dec 1 at 2:00 PM PDT until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Road closure planned. The annual Santa Claus Parade will be taking place. Next update time Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 12:04 PM PDT. (DBC-69604)
Location: Highway 101, in both directions between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River)
Description: Road closure planned for the annual Santa Claus Parade

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 17 Westbound
description: Highway 17, westbound. Bridge construction planned between Bridgeview Dr and Old Yale Rd for 2.5 km (Surrey). Starting Fri Nov 29 at 9:00 PM PST until Wed Dec 4. From 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM PST on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Road closure planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Detour planned. Work being done on November 29th and December 2nd-4th. Detour via Bridgeview Dr to 120th St. Next update time Wed Dec 4 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 8:43 AM PST. (DBC-70359)
Location: Highway 17, westbound between Bridgeview Dr and Old Yale Rd for 2.5 km (Surrey)
Description: Bridge construction. Road closure planned with detour via Bridgeview Dr to 120th St. Watch for traffic control personnel.

title: Highway 99 Both Directions
description: Highway 99, in both directions. Vehicle incident between Lost Lagoon Rd and Wren Trail for 0.4 km (Vancouver). Expect delays. The centre lane is closed due to a vehicle incident near Lost Lagoon. Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 3:30 PM PST. (DBC-70666)
Location: Highway 99, in both directions between Lost Lagoon Rd and Wren Trail, Vancouver
Description: Vehicle incident. Expect delays. The centre lane is closed due to a vehicle incident near Lost Lagoon.

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: [Truncated] Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification due to crewing issue. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, from Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM & 9:40PM, from Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM & 10:20PM. Priority boarding: essential service travelers, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Mon Dec 2 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated

title: Other Roads
description: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. Landslide at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection. Road closed. A temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-23443)
Location: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection
Description: Landslide, road closed. Temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Durrell Road, in both directions. Landslide at 700m from Highway 97. Road closed. Detour in effect. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road. Next update time Wed Apr 23, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 1:06 PM PDT. (DBC-27390)

title: Other Roads Both Directions

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: McKay Road, in both directions. Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-53013)
Description: Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads

Description: Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street due to bridge damage. Detour in effect via Highway 5.

Description: Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter.

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry. There will be required maintenance between Galena Bay and Shelter Bay. Starting Sat Nov 30 at 10:00 PM PST until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 AM PST. Ferry will be out of service. Last sailing from Shelter Bay at 9:00PM. Last sailing from Galena Bay at 9:30PM. Next update time Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 10:11 AM PST. (DBC-70350)

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions. There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay. Starting Sat Dec 7 at 10:00 PM PST until Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Ferry will be out of service. Last sailing from Shelter Bay will be 9pm. Last sailing from Galena Bay will be 9:30pm. Next update time Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 11:18 AM PST. (DBC-70516)
Location: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions
Description: There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay.
